full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' BSTOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHA CIG GIS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZOR DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING BTAGS NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PAR GCIG BYAS MANG PO YOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYING MA RNYED PA DANG, SNGA MO NAS DON GNYER CAN GRVA BSKUL ZHING SLAR YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYI SBYIN BDAG GI RIM 'GRO DGOS PA ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR CHO GA BAR RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN BAR PHAN AE SRID SNYAM PA'I @005B SLOB MA NYER MA BYAS PA'I BLUN PO SNYIN KHAM CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS BLA MA KONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA BSDEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DI RKYEN RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
